'''Icy Issues''' is a basic daily [[commission]] in [[Dragonspine]], [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Kaboom! [[Hilichurls]] have ignited their Exploding Barrels... but why are they this cold? Foil their dangerous scheme, and fast!}}
#Defeat all opponents (0/10)

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}

==Enemies==
; 10 enemies in two waves
Wave 1
*{{Enemy List|Cryo Slime*2;Ice Shield Hilichurl Guard*2;Cryo Samachurl*1;Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl*1}}
Wave 2
*{{Enemy List|Cryo Hilichurl Grenadier*3;Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl*1}}
